en.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Use the buttons below to manage apartments and residents.
en.invalidApartmentNumber: Please enter a valid apartment number.
en.noResidents: Apartment {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor} has no residents.
en.enterResidentName: Enter the name of the resident:
en.residentAdded: Resident "{residentName}" has been added to apartment {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor}.
en.apartmentNotFound: Apartment number {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor} not found.
en.apartmentAlreadyExists: Apartment number {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor} already exists.
en.apartmentAdded: Apartment number {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor} has been successfully added!
en.listOfApartments: List of apartment numbers on floor {floor}: {apartmentNumbers}
en.alreadyResident: You are already a resident of apartment {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor}.
en.notResident: You are not a resident of apartment {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor}.
en.residentRemoved: Resident "{residentName}" has been removed from apartment {apartmentNumber} on floor {floor}.

ru.welcomeMessage: Добро пожаловать! Используйте кнопки ниже для управления квартирами и жильцами.
ru.noResidents: В квартире {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor} нет жильцов.
ru.residentAdded: Жилец "{residentName}" был добавлен в квартиру {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor}.
ru.apartmentNotFound: Квартира с номером {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor} не найдена.
ru.apartmentAlreadyExists: Квартира с номером {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor} уже существует.
ru.apartmentAdded: Квартира с номером {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor} успешно добавлена!
ru.alreadyResident: Вы уже являетесь жильцом квартиры {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor}.
ru.notResident: Вы не являетесь жильцом квартиры {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor}.
ru.residentRemoved: Жилец "{residentName}" был удален из квартиры {apartmentNumber} на этаже {floor}.
